title: Breaking: Horrific Footage of Riverside Plane Crash Caught on Video | ODM & Evelyn In The Morning | 99.1 KGGI
text: Full coverage: ABC 7 Evelyn Erives has been a part of the KGGI family since she was 20 years old. Her “Entertainment Buzz” features the latest gossip and infotainment. Evelyn is an advocate for children and community programs all across the Inland Empire. ODM popped on the seen in the early 90’s as part of the Latin rap/ hip‐ hop group, Lighter Shade of Brown. In 2000, ODM began his radio career at 99.1 KGGI, hosting 6-11 p.m. and later moving his way to Music Director and Afternoon Drive Host. Contact
